mapper.sql: id, name, pid, startdate, enddate, weeks
mapper.select: select term.id as termid, term.name as termname,term.startdate as termstartdate, term.enddate as termenddate, term.weeks as termweeks , year.id as schoolYearId, year.name as schoolYearName from schoolyearterm term join schoolyearterm year on term.pid = year.id where NOW() between term.startdate and term.enddate
